## Data Science for Statisticians

The course ST 558 - Data Science for Statisticians takes a deep dive into R programming and then looks at many topics that are useful for doing data science. 

The course learning materials are <a href = "https://jbpost2.github.io/ST-558-Data-Science-for-Statisticians/" target = "_blank">freely available here</a>.
